[Skip to content](https://fai.utm.my/department-of-intelligence-informatics#content "Skip to content")

Department of Intelligence Informatics
======================================

The Department of Intelligence and Informatics (II) serves as a pioneering hub at the forefront of the convergence of software engineering, artificial intelligence, informatics, and computer system engineering. Recognized as the premier referral department in Intelligent Software Engineering, Informatics, and Computer System Engineering, II plays a crucial role in propelling the Faculty of Artificial Intelligence’s accomplishments in research, publications, consultancy, and teaching. Committed to lifelong learning and collaborative initiatives, II actively collaborates with industries and stakeholders, addressing real-world challenges at the cutting edge of technology. This collaboration ensures that II members and students take the lead in teaching, learning, and research, addressing industrial challenges that extend beyond departmental boundaries. II remains steadfast in its dedication to shaping the future of technology through innovation, academic excellence, and impactful collaborations, addressing real-world industrial challenges across the spectrum of artificial intelligence, software engineering, informatics, and computer systems engineering.

##### Niche Area

**Computational Intelligence | Knowledge Representation & Reasoning, Uncertainty Reasoning | Expert System | Data Management | Quantum Computing | Computer Vision | Machine Learning, Reinforcement Learning, Deep Learning, Natural Language Processing| Explainable AI | Generative AI | AI Optimization, AI Engineering, Ai Fundamentals | AI Advanced | AI Programming Technique | Cyber Security | Data Analytics and Visualization | Artificial Super Intelligence | Artificial Narrow Intelligence | Artificial Generative Intelligence | Cognitive Science | Mathematics for AI**
